short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let Me Focus can help it's users to avoid distraction and boost productivity by blocking websites of choice during work hours.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let Me Focus is a Chrome Browser extension that can help it's users to avoid distraction when switched ON. It works by not allowing the browser to load any listed social media/OTT websites whenever user tries to access it and this could redirect us back to work by saving us from getting distracted again and again. In short, it is a website blocker that doesn't let you access tick-marked websites.
